609830.name: Riders of Asgard - Soundtrack
609830.description:
Riders of Asgard is a fun and challenging Viking BMX game and now you can listen to the custom written soundtrack whenever you want. These 7 tracks have been custom written for Riders of Asgard by Karl Muller Music and Sound Design.

Riders of Asgard is much more than your average run-of-the-mill, Viking BMX game. It’s a historically correct Viking BMX game, with historically accurate Viking bikes and locations.

So go ahead! Be the Biking Viking!

DLC Features

  • Track 1 - The Adventure Begins.
  • Track 2 - Let's Ride!
  • Track 3 - The Forest.
  • Track 4 - The High Seas.
  • Track 5 - The Island.
  • Track 6 - The Chase.
  • Track 7 - At World's End.
